messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] help!
messages.msgSnippet: Try this one, I don t know if it will answer your specific question but my boys love it! http://www.howstuffworks.com/ April ... From: Trisha Sides
messages.messageBody:
Try this one, I don't know if it will answer your specific question but my
boys love it!
http://www.howstuffworks.com/

April


-----Original Message-----
From: Trisha Sides [mailto:yschild@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 10, 2000 10:59 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] help!


Ok,I give up. does anyone know of a website or a good book that explains
visually the basic concepts behind electricity? Where it comes from etc. ,
maybe some simple experiments? something a 6 yr old prereader can
understand. I don't want to dampen his interest with something to
complicated (read; boring) but I'm stumped as to how to explain it to him.
Thanks in advance for any ideas,
Trisha
